alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 6:23PM CDT until June 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SCOTTS BLUFF AND SOUTHEASTERN SIOUX COUNTIES... At 522 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lake Alice, or 8 miles north of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lake Alice. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: If a tornado or other severe weather is spotted, report it to the National Weather Service or your local nearest law enforcement agency who will send your report. This act may save lives of others in the path of dangerous weather.
